Html:
When I attempt this, TI connect does not recognize the device. The emulator works fine but TI connect fails to find the device. I have WabbitEmu installed on an LGK10 running Android 6.0.1 Software version K42810f. Also I've installed WabbitEmu on a friend's Android device, a tablet that's a few years old. Not sure of the OS on that one as I don't have it with me right now.

Anyone else experience problems running TI Connect with WabbitEmu installed on Android Devices? Any suggestions?

Thanks -- Joni
I
